card.name: Dwarven Imprisonment
card.text: Dwarven Imprisonment deals 3 damage to target player. That player can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)

card.name: Skilled Combatant
card.text: Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Whenever Skilled Combatant attacks, you may gain control of target Equipment until end of turn. If you do, attach it to Skilled Combatant.

card.name: Helmsguard Shenanigans
card.text: Each player may put a creature from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Each player that does must return a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand. Repeat this process for artifacts, enchantments, lands, and planeswalkers.

card.name: Backup Plan Strategist
card.text: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+0. {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put X 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Great Steam Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Great Steam Dragon deals combat damage to a player, add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool at the beginning of your next postcombat main phase. {2}{R}: Great Steam Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Maniacal Scourge
card.text: Whenever a red instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to a creature or player, Maniacal Scourge gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is equal to the damage dealt.

card.name: Eccentric Visions
card.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. If Eccentric Visions was kicked, exile the top three cards of your library instead. You may play those cards this turn.

card.name: Sashira and Hulk V3.1
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) When Sashira and Hulk V3.1 enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. {U}{R}, Sacrifice another artifact: Put two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Automated Assembly Line
card.text: Put three 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield, then choose one — • Automated Assembly Line deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of artifacts you control. • Draw a card for each artifact you control.

card.name: Mercurial Golem
card.text: Defender {1}: Until end of turn, Mercurial Golem loses all other abilities and gains your choice of flying, hexproof, or indestructible. Activate this ability only once per turn.

card.name: Dimensional Cyclone
card.text: Return all nonartifact creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Mystic Temptress
card.text: Mystic Temptress enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{U}{U}, {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mystic Temptress: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. {3}{U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it for as long as you control Mystic Temptress.

card.name: Mimic of the Stag
card.text: Hexproof Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Clairvoyant Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever Clairvoyant Sphinx deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand.

card.name: Study the Tradewinds
card.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Draw a card. If Study the Tradewinds was kicked, whenever you cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Being of Myth
card.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Being of Myth's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand. Being of Myth has trample as long as its power is seven or greater. When Being of Myth enters the battlefield, if it was kicked and you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Spectacle of Power
card.text: Remove all +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control and all charge counters from among artifacts you control. Creatures you control become X/X until end of turn, where X is the number of counters removed in this way.

card.name: Mimic of the Woods
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Savage Summoning
card.text: Savage Summoning can't be countered. The next creature card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. That spell can't be countered. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Arachnid Queen
card.text: Reach When Arachnid Queen enters the battlefield, put a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach onto the battlefield for each creature with flying your opponents control. {3}{G}{G}: Other spider creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Jungle Hydra
card.text: Jungle Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Forest you control. Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Jungle Hydra and it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Prowling Capbalta
card.text: Prowling Capbalta has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. {1}{G}: Remove Prowling Capbalta from combat. If it was attacking, untap it.

card.name: Compliant Harmony
card.text: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. Then if Compliant Harmony was kicked, that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Gravefeeder Ooze
card.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) When Gravefeeder Ooze enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player discards two cards. Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Gravefeeder Ooze.

card.name: Proclamation of Vetrayel
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other nonland permanents with the same converted mana cost as that permanent.

card.name: Tunneling Cragwyrm
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield. {B}, Sacrifice an Insect: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tunneling Cragwyrm and regenerate it. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Strike from the Darkness
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Strike from the Darkness, tap an untapped creature you control. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Entrail Merchant
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Corpse Puppeteer
card.text: {1}{B}{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control, except it's a Puppet in addition to its other types and gains defender and "this creature's activated abilities can't be activated." {T}, Pay 1 life: Target Puppet you control loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Gatekeeper Demon
card.text: Flying Pay 6 life: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Riddle of the Crypt
card.text: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library. If Riddle of the Crypt was kicked, instead search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bitter Incarcerator
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Flying Bitter Incarcerator enters the battlefield tapped unless it was kicked. When Bitter Incarcerator enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

card.name: Rite of Renewal
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Rite of Renewal, sacrifice all creatures you control but one. Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Put a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature sacrificed to cast Rite of Renewal.

card.name: Hydra Maw
card.text: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has trample. {B}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. Equip {5}

card.name: Orb of Mimicry
card.text: Orb of Mimicry enters the battlefield with two charge counters on it. Equipped creature gets +3/+3. {2}{G}{U}, Remove a charge counter from Orb of Mimicry: Equipped creature becomes a copy of target creature until end of turn. Equip {3}

card.name: Nimble Autarmor
card.text: Augment {1}{U}{R} ({1}{U}{R}: Put a charge counter on this card. Augment only as a sorcery.) Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. {1}: Return equipped creature to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if Nimble Autarmor has a charge counter on it. Equip {1}

card.name: Dwarven Hunting Bow
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{R}{W}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature." Equip {0}

card.name: Enchanted Trinket
card.text: When Enchanted Trinket enters the battlefield, choose a color. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from the chosen color. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with that color.) Equip {2} Bloodbond — {4}{W}{B}, Sacrifice equipped creature: Destroy target permanent of the chosen color.

card.name: Marsh Flats
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Scalding Tarn
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Arid Mesa
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Misty Rainforest
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Grand Arsenal of the Keep
card.text: Defender When Grand Arsenal of the Keep enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of Equipment cards and exile them. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, put an Equipment card exiled with Grand Arsenal of the Keep onto the battlefield, then attach it to that creature.

card.name: Mental Mastery
card.text: Enchant planeswalker You control enchanted planeswalker.

card.name: Soulsapper Slime
card.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) When Soulsapper Slime enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, exile all creature cards from graveyards. {4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature. Soulsapper Slime gets +1/+1 for each creature card exiled with it and has all activated abilities of those cards.

card.name: Apocryphal Offering
card.text: Apocryphal Offering can't be countered. Put six 1/1 red Human creature tokens named Cultist onto the battlefield tapped, then put three 5/5 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens named Idol onto the battlefield.

card.name: Leader of the Herd
card.text: Kicker {2}{G}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G}{G} as you cast this spell.) Trample When Leader of the Herd enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, search your library for any number of creature cards with total power 8 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: The Grand Overseer
card.text: Until your next turn, another target permanent you control gains protection from all colors. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that's white, blue, black, red, or green.) Search your library for a colorless card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Put a 10/10 colorless creature token named Worldcleanser with indestructible onto the battlefield, then exile all colored permanents.

card.name: Hexbender Warlock
card.text: Flash Whenever a player would draw a card, instead that player exiles the top card of his or her library. If the exiled card is a permanent card, each player may put a token that's a copy of that card onto the battlefield. If the exiled card is an instant or sorcery card, each player may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tezzeret, the Mad Tinkerer
card.text: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You get an emblem with "Artifacts you control have ‘{T}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain that much life.'"

card.name: Elspeth of Tainted Heart
card.text: Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Put target creature card in a graveyard on top of its owner's library. You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch and lifelink."

card.name: Mystic of Unbridled Power
card.text: {3}{G}{G}: Target land you control becomes an 8/8 green Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land. Whenever a land you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on Mystic of Unbridled Power.

card.name: Elspeth of Tainted Heart MSR
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch and lifelink.

card.name: Tezzeret, the Mad Tinkerer MSR
card.text: Artifacts you control have ‘{T}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain that much life.'

card.name: Bat MSR
card.text: Flying

card.name: Dwarf Warrior MSR
card.text: First strike

card.name: Spider MSR
card.text: Reach

card.name: Worldcleanser MSR
card.text: Indestructible

card.name: Spirit MSR
card.text: Flying
